definitions.title: vb. Pilpēl,
definitions.body: only Pf. 1 s. sf. [[וְטֵאטֵאתִיהָ בְּמַטְאֲטֵא הַשְׁמֵד]] Is 14:23 and I will sweep it with the besom of destruction, of ´[[י]]'s laying Babylon waste. (Form of √ dub.; [[ו]]“[[ע]] Ol:§ 253; [[ע]]“[[ע]] Sta:§ 464; undecided Kö:i. 652 ff. (q. v.), cf. Ew:§ 121 b.)
